content:
Social media has definitely changed the way that singers and other musicians can get noticed, and has both positive and negative effects. In some ways, social media has made it easier for talented singers to gain exposure and build an audience. Platforms like YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and SoundCloud have provided aspiring artists with a platform to share their music and showcase their skills to a wide audience. Many artists have been discovered through their social media presence, and have used these platforms as a tool to launch their careers.

At the same time, social media has also made the music industry more crowded than ever, as it has become increasingly difficult to stand out in a sea of other aspiring musicians. In addition, the algorithms of social media platforms can sometimes work against artists, making it more difficult for their posts and music to be seen by a wider audience. However, overall, social media has likely made it slightly easier for talented singers to get noticed and build a following, even if sustained success in the music industry continues to be a challenge.
